div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1039 Chometi, Makharadze raion, Georgia, c. 1926 Burial: before 325 B.C. (Golenko, Kapa- nadze) Contents: 380+ AR. Pot hoard with silver bracelets Colchis: hemidr. (1 with Α) Disposition: Tiflis Pakhomov VIII, 1897 † Golenko-Kapanadze, NE 6 (1966), pp. 31-61
